verses.verse: All <S%H3605><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day <S%H3117><s%> shall you observe <S%H8104><s%> to do, <S%H6213><s%> that you may live, <S%H2421><s%> and multiply, <S%H7235><s%> and go <S%H935><s%> in and possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers. <S%H1><s%>

And you shall remember <S%H2142><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> led <S%H3212><s%> you these <S%H2088><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> to humble <S%H6031><s%> you, and to prove <S%H5254><s%> you, to know <S%H3045><s%> what <S%H853><s%> <S%H834><s%> was in your heart, <S%H3824><s%> whether you would keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments, <S%H4687><s%> or no. <S%H3808><s%>

And he humbled <S%H6031><s%> you, and suffered you to hunger, <S%H7456><s%> and fed <S%H398><s%> you with manna, <S%H4478><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you knew <S%H3045><s%> not, neither <S%H3808><s%> did your fathers <S%H1><s%> know; <S%H3045><s%> that he might make you know <S%H3045><s%> that man <S%H120><s%> does not live <S%H2421><s%> by bread <S%H3899><s%> only, <S%H905><s%> but by every <S%H3605><s%> word that proceeds <S%H4161><s%> out of the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> does man <S%H120><s%> live. <S%H2421><s%>
Your raiment <S%H8071><s%> waxed not old <S%H1086><s%> on you, neither <S%H3808><s%> did your foot <S%H7272><s%> swell, <S%H1216><s%> these <S%H2088><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

You shall also consider <S%H3045><s%> in your heart, <S%H3824><s%> that, as a man <S%H376><s%> chastens <S%H3256><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> so the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> chastens <S%H3256><s%> you.
Therefore you shall keep <S%H8104><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> to walk <S%H3212><s%> in his ways, <S%H1870><s%> and to fear <S%H3372><s%> him.

For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> brings <S%H935><s%> you into <S%H413><s%> a good <S%H2896><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> of brooks <S%H5158><s%> of water, <S%H4325><s%> of fountains <S%H5869><s%> and depths <S%H8415><s%> that spring <S%H3318><s%> out of valleys <S%H1237><s%> and hills; <S%H2022><s%>

A land <S%H776><s%> of wheat, <S%H2406><s%> and barley, <S%H8184><s%> and vines, <S%H1612><s%> and fig <S%H8384><s%> trees, and pomegranates; <S%H7416><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%> olive, <S%H2132><s%> and honey; <S%H1706><s%>

A land <S%H776><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> scarceness, <S%H4544><s%> you shall not lack <S%H2637><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> thing in it; a land <S%H776><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> are iron, <S%H1270><s%> and out of whose hills <S%H2042><s%> you may dig <S%H2672><s%> brass. <S%H5178><s%>

When you have eaten <S%H398><s%> and are full, <S%H7646><s%> then you shall bless <S%H1288><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> for the good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he has given <S%H5414><s%> you.

Beware <S%H8104><s%> that you forget <S%H7911><s%> not the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> in not keeping <S%H8104><s%> his commandments, <S%H4687><s%> and his judgments, <S%H4941><s%> and his statutes, <S%H2708><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I command <S%H6680><s%> you this day: <S%H3117><s%>
Lest <S%H6435><s%> when you have eaten <S%H398><s%> and are full, <S%H7646><s%> and have built <S%H1129><s%> goodly <S%H2896><s%> houses, <S%H1004><s%> and dwelled <S%H3427><s%> therein;

And when your herds <S%H1241><s%> and your flocks <S%H6629><s%> multiply, <S%H7235><s%> and your silver <S%H3701><s%> and your gold <S%H2091><s%> is multiplied, <S%H7235><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that you have is multiplied; <S%H7235><s%>

Then your heart <S%H3824><s%> be lifted <S%H7311><s%> up, and you forget <S%H7911><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> which brought <S%H3318><s%> you forth <S%H4161><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> from the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage; <S%H5650><s%>

Who led <S%H3212><s%> you through that great <S%H1419><s%> and terrible <S%H3372><s%> wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> wherein were fiery <S%H8314><s%> serpents, <S%H5175><s%> and scorpions, <S%H6137><s%> and drought, <S%H6774><s%> where <S%H834><s%> there was no <S%H369><s%> water; <S%H4325><s%> who brought <S%H3318><s%> you forth <S%H4161><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> out of the rock <S%H6697><s%> of flint; <S%H2496><s%>

Who fed <S%H398><s%> you in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> with manna, <S%H4478><s%> which <S%H834><s%> your fathers <S%H1><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> not, that he might humble <S%H6031><s%> you, and that he might prove <S%H5254><s%> you, to do you good <S%H3190><s%> at your latter <S%H319><s%> end;
And you say <S%H559><s%> in your heart, <S%H3824><s%> My power <S%H3581><s%> and the might <S%H6108><s%> of my hand <S%H3027><s%> has gotten <S%H6213><s%> me this <S%H2088><s%> wealth. <S%H2428><s%>

But you shall remember <S%H2142><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God: <S%H430><s%> for it is he that gives <S%H5414><s%> you power <S%H3581><s%> to get <S%H6213><s%> wealth, <S%H2428><s%> that he may establish <S%H6965><s%> his covenant <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he swore <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers, <S%H1><s%> as it is this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And it shall be, if <S%H518><s%> you do at all forget <S%H7911><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and walk <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> them, and worship <S%H7812><s%> them, I testify <S%H5749><s%> against you this day <S%H3117><s%> that you shall surely <S%H3588><s%> perish. <S%H6><s%>

As the nations <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> destroys <S%H6><s%> before your face, so <S%H3651><s%> shall you perish; <S%H6><s%> because <S%H6118><s%> you would not be obedient <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>
